items.name: Sunfish
items.source: Found in rivers, 6am – 7pm, Spring and Summer during sunny weather.

items.name: Catfish
items.source: Found in rivers and Secret Woods, 6am – midnight, Spring and Fall. Only when raining. Can also be found in Summer (raining) in the Secret Woods and Witch's Swamp, and in Winter with a Rain Totem.

items.name: Shad
items.source: Found in rivers, 9am – 2am, Spring, Summer, and Fall. Only when raining.

items.name: Tiger Trout
items.source: Found in rivers, 6am – 7pm, Fall and Winter. Can be found in any weather.

items.name: Carp
items.source: Found in the Mountain Lake anytime during Spring, Summer, or Fall. Also found in Secret Woods or Sewer, anytime, all seasons.

items.name: Bullhead
items.source: Found in the Mountain Lake, anytime, all seasons.

items.name: Sturgeon
items.source: Found in the Mountain Lake, 6am – 7pm, Summer and Winter.

items.name: Tuna
items.source: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 7pm, Summer and Winter.

items.name: Red Snapper
items.source: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 7pm, Summer and Fall. Only when raining.

items.name: Tilapia
items.source: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 2pm, Summer and Fall.

items.name: Bream
items.source: Found in rivers, 6pm – 2am, all seasons.

items.name: Eel
items.source: Found in the Ocean, 4pm – 2am, Spring or Fall. Only when raining.

items.name: Crayfish
items.source: Caught in crab pots (freshwater).

items.name: Crab
items.source: Caught in crab pots (ocean). Also drops from Rock Crabs or Lava Crabs in The Mines.

items.name: Cockle
items.source: Caught in crab pots (ocean), or by beach foraging.

items.name: Mussel
items.source: Caught in crab pots (ocean), or by beach foraging.

items.name: Shrimp
items.source: Caught in crab pots (ocean).

items.name: Snail
items.source: Caught in crab pots (freshwater).

items.name: Periwinkle
items.source: Caught in crab pots (freshwater).

items.name: Oyster
items.source: Caught in crab pots (ocean), or by beach foraging.

items.name: Clam
items.source: Caught in crab pots (ocean), or by beach foraging.

items.name: Ghostfish
items.source: Found in ponds in The Mines (floors 20 and 60), anytime, all seasons. May also be dropped by Ghosts.

items.name: Sandfish
items.source: Found in the pond in The Desert, 6am – 8pm, all seasons.

items.name: Woodskip
items.source: Found in the Secret Woods and the Forest Farm, anytime, all seasons.

items.name: Iron Bar
items.source: Smelting Iron Ore in the Furnace, or crafting using the 'Transmute (Fe)' recipe.

items.name: Gold Bar
items.source: Smelting Gold Ore in the Furnace, or crafting using the 'Transmute (Au)' recipe.

items.name: Earth Crystal
items.source: Found by foraging on floors 1–39 of The Mines, in Geodes and Omni Geodes, or dropped by Duggies on floors 6–29.

items.name: Frozen Tear
items.source: Found by foraging on floors 41–79 of The Mines, in Frozen Geodes and Omni Geodes, or dropped by Dust Sprites.

items.name: Fire Quartz
items.source: Found by foraging on floors 81–119 of The Mines, in Magma Geodes and Omni Geodes.

items.name: Bat Wing
items.source: Dropped by Bats in The Mines or Skull Cavern.

items.name: Solar Essence
items.source: Dropped by Ghosts, Squid Kids, or Metal Heads in The Mines; Mummies or Iridium Bats in Skull Cavern; also produced by Sunfish in Fish Ponds or purchased from Krobus.

items.name: Void Essence
items.source: Dropped by Shadow Brutes or Shadow Shamans in The Mines, Serpents in Skull Cavern; also produced by Void Salmon in Fish Ponds or purchased from Krobus.

items.name: Fiddlehead Fern
items.source: Summer foraging in the Secret Woods, foraging on Prehistoric Floors in Skull Cavern, or cutting down Green Rain Trees.

items.name: Truffle
items.source: Produced by Pigs.

items.name: Poppy
items.source: Grown as a Summer crop.

items.name: Maki Roll
items.source: Cooked using the recipe (learned from *The Queen of Sauce* or at The Saloon).

items.name: Fried Egg
items.source: Cooked using a kitchen.

items.name: Sea Urchin
items.source: Beach foraging after using 300 wood to fix the bridge to the east side of the Beach, during crab mating season, or foraging on the Beach Farm.

items.name: Sunflower
items.source: Grown as a Summer or Fall crop.

items.name: Duck Feather
items.source: Dropped by Ducks.

items.name: Aquamarine
items.source: Mined from Aquamarine Nodes, found in boxes in The Mines, or from Fishing Treasure Chests.

items.name: Red Cabbage
items.source: Grown as a Summer crop. Seeds available at Pierre's in Year 2+, from the Traveling Cart, or dropped by Serpents, Mummies, and Purple Slimes.

items.name: Nautilus Shell
items.source: Found on the Beach during Winter or on the Beach Farm during any season. Also a random gift from Demetrius. (Note: not the Nautilus Fossil artifact.)

items.name: Chub
items.source: Found in the mountain lake and river during all seasons, at any time.

items.name: Frozen Geode
items.source: Found in The Mines, floors 41–79.

items.name: Hay
items.source: Purchased at Marnie's Ranch or Desert Trader, or harvested from Grass or Wheat.

items.name: Apple
items.source: Harvested from Apple Trees during Fall or obtained from the Farm Cave (fruit bat option).

items.name: Wine
items.source: Produced in a Keg.

items.name: Rabbit's Foot
items.source: Produced by Rabbits or dropped by Serpents in Skull Cavern (0.8% chance).

items.name: Pomegranate
items.source: Harvested from Pomegranate Trees in Fall or obtained from the Farm Cave (fruit bat option).
